ygData.subject: Re: money?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I wouldn t recommend the Cauldron either... it s a bad place to fight in general. If you re on Faydwer, either fight in Crushbone (level 10 is sort of a
ygData.messageBody:
David Rubino wrote:

> From: David Rubino <tigger@...>
>
> The Cauldron is a bad idea for a Level 10. It is a bad idea for m at Level
> 15 unless I have a pretty good group.
>

I wouldn't recommend the Cauldron either... it's a bad place to fight in general.

If you're on Faydwer, either fight in Crushbone (level 10 is sort of a weird
level for CB, since Centurions generally don't give you exp, but Legionnaires and
Slavers will kill you) or in Steamfont (great creatures there, skeles, earth
eles, drakes etc.).

>
> Don't buy ringmail . . . buy banded armor. Much better, and probably
> cheaper depending on the smith you get it from. As far as I know, makes
> your character look exactly the same. I started buying my banded set when I
> was Level 10 . . . completed it at Level 14 to the tune of about 120 plat.
>

This depends on your size and location. On Faydwer, size small ringmail is VERY
common, since it loads in Unrest on fairly low level monsters. You can buy
ringmail for 4-10 plat a piece easily in BB and Unrest. Banded will usually cost
you more, depending on the piece. Banded is better though.

Jyzan
